pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.0: 91. The training rule on rainy-season robes
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.2: At that time the Master had allowed the rainy-season robe for the monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.4: Knowing this, the monks from the group of six used over-sized rainy-season robes.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.5: As they were walking about, they were dragging them along, both in front and behind.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.6: The monks of few desires complained and criticized those monks,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.8: “How can the monks from the group of six use over-sized rainy-season robes?” …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.9: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.12: Foolish men, how can you use over-sized rainy-season robes?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.13: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.14: And, monks, this training rule should be recited thus:
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.15: ‘If a monk is getting a rainy-season robe made, it should be made to the right size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.16: This is the right size: 1.5 meters long and 67.5 centimeters wide.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.17: If it exceeds that, it is to be cut down, and he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.2: for use during the four months of the rainy season.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.4: making it himself or getting someone else to make it, it should be made to the right size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.6: This is the right size: 1.5 meters long and 67.5 centimeters wide.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.9: If he makes one or gets one made that exceeds that, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.10: When he obtains it, it is to be cut down, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.11: If he finishes what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.12: If he gets others to finish what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.13: If he finishes himself what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.14: If he gets others to finish what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.15: If he makes one or gets one made for the benefit of someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.16: If he obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.18: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.19: The ninth rule, the training rule on rainy-season robes, is finished.
